body_html: Sidenote: all these tiny little changes around icon-names are related to switching from the Rails 3 age font-awesome-sass-rails gem to still-maintained font-awesome-sass gem, there are no changes in behavior or appearance.

body: Sidenote: all these tiny little changes around icon-names are related to switching from the Rails 3 age `font-awesome-sass-rails` gem to still-maintained `font-awesome-sass` gem, there are no changes in behavior or appearance.
